item.description:
** UPDATE **

The first location Janel has decided to switch to Playwright to better accomodate the size of the group, and drink specials for Playwright and Richter's are listed below.
________________________________________________

Join Janel in celebrating her birthday! She'll be hitting up the following locations:

Playwright, 9pm - 10:30pm (please note: cover charge after 9:30)
Drink specials: $3 miller light

Black Bear, 10:30pm - 12am
Drink specials pending

Richters, 12am - close
Drink specials: $2 PBR, $2 miller high life, $4 molson drafts

If you think you might go, please RSVP early -- headcount matters when asking bars for drink specials!

Janel is your contact for this event: 203-848-4538
item.name: Sat. 3/8 - Janel's Birthday Bar Crawl
